Home Libraries People FAQ More

read

Attempt to read a certain amount of data from a stream before returning. 

template<
    typename SyncReadStream,
    typename MutableBufferSequence>
std::size_t read(
    SyncReadStream & s,
    const MutableBufferSequence & buffers);
